org.lightningj.paywall.util

Class SettingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.util.SettingUtils

  • public class SettingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing help methods parsing setting values. Created by Philip Vendil on 2019-01-17.

    • Method Detail

      • checkRequiredString

        public static java.lang.String checkRequiredString(java.lang.String settingValue,
                                                   java.lang.String settingKey)
                                            throws InternalErrorException
        Help method that checks that given setting isn't null or empty otherwise it throws an InternalErrorException with error message that related key should be set.
        Parameters:
        settingValue - the value to set.
        settingKey - the key to use in error message
        Returns:
        the returned value.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if settingValue was empty.

      • checkStringWithDefault

        public static java.lang.String checkStringWithDefault(java.lang.String settingValue,
                                                      java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Method that returns related string or default value if setting is empty.
        Parameters:
        settingValue - the value of setting
        defaultValue - the default value if not set or empty.
        Returns:
        either the setting or the default value

      • checkRequiredInteger

        public static int checkRequiredInteger(java.lang.String settingValue,
                                       java.lang.String settingKey)
                                throws InternalErrorException
        Help method to parse an integer for a required setting.
        Parameters:
        settingValue - the value to convert to an integer.
        settingKey - the key to use in error message
        Returns:
        a integer version of the setting.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if setting value was empty or non-integer.

      • checkIntegerWithDefault

        Parameters:

        settingKey - the related setting key
        defaultValue - the default value if not set or empty.
        Returns:
        either the setting or the default value
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if setting value was empty or non-integer.
